review: Yes expectations were high, but it's a good device.
author: John Guerrero II

review: this device is sweet. I got it for my daughter who is starting collage and now she just plugs it into any tv and bam! instant smart tv. and she loves the iphone voice app
author: davey wells

review: Love the Fire Stick...I can bring up everything on my TV thats on my tablet
author: Jeannine Rose Harrison

review: Very good to have when you have friends over
author: dwaine

review: The TV stick took some time to install and I had to get a friend to help me.  It seems to be a little quirky and I have to unplug it and then plug it in again to get it to work most of the time.  However, I do love being able to watch a movie or t.v. show whenever i want to.
author: Linda L. Stevens
